dynamic_actor.description: [string]Name of the dynamic actor that should be disabled when attached and enabled when dropped.

attached_dynamic_actor.description: [string]Name of the dynamic actor that should be enabled when attached and disabled when dropped.

use_all_dynamic_actors.description: [bool]True if all dynamic actors should be disabled when attached and enabled when dropped.

offset.description: If set, this offset is applied on top of any other offsets when attaching the entity.

rotation_offset.description: If set, this rotation (in angles) is applied on top of any other offsets when attaching the entity.

offset_node.description: [string]If specified, the local space position and rotation of the node relative to the unit root will be added to the offset when attaching.

parent_attach_anim.description: [string]Animation to play on the parent when attaching.

parent_detach_anim.description: [string]Animation to play on the parent when detaching.

affect_scale.description: [bool]This should only be applied to main entities that will attach to something in the world, like hellpods.

ignore_weapon_damage_for_parent.description: [bool]This variable will decide if we should be able to damage our parent with our weapons.
